titleStmt.title: The Hector of Germany. Or The Palsgraue, prime Elector A new play, an honourable history. As it hath beene publickly acted at the Red-Bull, and at the Curtayne, by a company of young-men of this citie. Made by W. Smith: with new additions.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Wentworth, fl. 1601-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Creede, for Iosias Harrison, and are to be solde in Pater-Noster-Row, at the signe of the Golden Anker,

notesStmt.note: I2 is the cancel title used in STC 22871a.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Pater-Noster-Row, at the signe of the Golden Anker
